content.body: I want some credit for resisting the urge to dump a redesigned <checkbox> element proposal into https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/6578 ... it's very tempting, but I know incremental progress is way more likely to happen here than a redesign and me doing that would only derail the discussion.
